resources.string: This app gives a view into the power usage of your android device. One unique feature is the graph of charging done versus time taken.

Hello. Thank you for using my app. This is supposed to be an EULA. So here goes... \n I have created this app based on my knowledge of the android battery monitor class. So please use this app as a guidance and do not stake your life savings on it - I will not be responsible for any loss in any form. :-D
